confederateFootnotes.%: Begins game on exhausted side with disorganized Strength marker. Historical Note: Manpower includes 46th Alabama.
confederateFootnotes.#: Begins game at Fatigue Level 1 on normal side. Also, is not released at start (see Special Rule 3).

confederateFootnotes.*: May not activate on Turn 1. Exception: May be eligible for “Early Release”; see Special Rule 5.
confederateFootnotes.^: May not activate on Turn 1 and starts Turn 2 at Fatigue Level 1 on normal side.

unionFootnotes.#: Begins game at Fatigue Level 1 on normal side.
unionFootnotes.^: Reinforcements on Turn 2; see Special Rule 6.

confederateFootnotes.*: Indicated units may not activate until Turn 3.

confederateFootnotes.#: Units may not activate (but may entrench) unless a Union unit moves adjacent, at which point that specific unit is immediately released from this restriction.
confederateFootnotes.*: On Turn 1, units may neither activate nor entrench unless a unless a Union unit moves adjacent, at which point that specific unit is immediately released

unionFootnotes.^: Begins game on exhausted side at Fatigue Level 1.

confederateFootnotes.+: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 2 on their normal sides.
confederateFootnotes.*: Units may not activate until Turn 2.

unionFootnotes.*: Units may not activate until Turn 2.
unionFootnotes.+: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 1.

confederateFootnotes.*: Units begin game on their exhausted sides.
confederateFootnotes.+: Units begin game with disorganized Strength markers.
confederateFootnotes.^: Reynolds begins game at Fatigue Level 2.

confederateFootnotes.+: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 1 on their exhausted sides with disorganized Strength markers and Demoralized-1 markers.
confederateFootnotes.*: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 1 on their exhausted sides with disorganized Strength markers.
confederateFootnotes.^: Units begin the game at Fatigue Level 0 on their exhausted sides with disorganized Strength markers.

unionFootnotes.*: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 1 on their exhausted sides with disorganized Strength markers.
unionFootnotes.#: Ewing may not activate until Turn 2.
unionFootnotes.&: Units begin game at Fatigue Level 1 on their normal sides.

unionFootnotes.*: Units begin game under Breastwork-Complete markers.
unionFootnotes.+: WS Smith is placed on the map with a Fatigue Level of 1.

scenarios.name: Inflict All the Punishment You Can

confederateFootnotes.*: Units may not activate on Turn 1, but may be released early (see Special Rule 3).
confederateFootnotes.+: Units may not activate on Turns 1 through 10 and may never be released early. Exception: If a Union infantry unit enters Warren County, these units are
confederateFootnotes.#: Units may not activate on Turns 1 and 2 and may never be released early.
confederateFootnotes.^: Reynolds may not activate on Turn 1, may never be released early, and starts Turn 2 at Fatigue Level 1 on its normal side.
confederateFootnotes.%: Units and leader may not activate or transfer until Turn 5 and may never be released early.
confederateFootnotes.$: Units begin the game under Fort-Complete markers.

unionFootnotes.#: Units begin the game at Fatigue Level 1 on their normal sides.
